name: Yoles Martinique sailing
description:
Yoles Martinique is a video game that simulates a yole race on the waters of the island of Martinique.
The game's purpose is to offer the opportunity to live a yole race at any moment of the year. It caters not only to fans of this race who will be able to be in command of the yole boat, but also to people around the world who will learn more about this yole race and about the island of Martinique.
